paper_title.en: Photopeak profile of full energy and escape peaks in neutron caprure prompt-gammaray spectra(2)
Re-evaluation of Gamma-ray energy by The use of 192-Ir as an internal reference standard(2)
Phorobeak Profile of Full Energy and Escape Peaks in Newt ron Capture Prompt Gamma-Ray Spectra
Re-evaluation of Gamma-Ray Energy by Me Use of 192-Ir as an Internal Refereuce Standerds
Effect of bremsstrahlung and Compton-electron induced summing on Ge-detector photopeak shapes

description.en: Appearance of the random summing shape on a shoulder of a photopeak shape was examined by co-acquisition of an EC decay source (Mn-54) or a beta(-)-IT transition source (Cs-137-Ba-137m) and precision pulser signals. An empirical functional modelling for the random summing shape can be made in the region close to the photopeak. The co-acquisition technique with the pulser revealed a direct measure of the random summing counting loss of the photopeak counts.
